CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nano X Imaging Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing medical imaging systems. It offers a Nanox System which is a combination of hardware and software. It develops a prototype of the Nanox.ARC, a medical imaging system incorporating its novel digital X-ray source; and Nanox.CLOUD, a companion cloud-based software that will allow for the delivery of medical screening as a service.

value.name: Orit Wimpfheimer
value.title: Chief Medical Officer & VP-Product Nanox AI
